data.actual_result: The timer is appended to the "XXX is typing..."
data.expected_result: The timer is on the right next to the stop watch
data.short_description: Slow Mode Timer in the wrong place when someone is typing
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a channel with slow mode enabled - Enable slowmode and set it to 5 seconds - Send a message while someone is typing and observe the timer
